Uses of Class
adept.common.AudioOffset

  • Packages that use AudioOffset 
    Package Description
    adept.common
    Provides common data structures for use in the ADEPT framework, including the input Document and its TokenStream containing every Token, and the output HltContentContainer containing multiple kinds of annotations, such as EntityMention and Relation, which are based on the Chunk class.
    adept.utilities
    Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions.
